title: MTLs for Obbegoda Central College and Bakinigahawela Muslim Central College in Moneragala
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Sudath Silva – Mahindodaya Technological Laboratories (MTL) established at the Obbegoda Central College and Bakinigahawela Muslim Central College in Moneragala were vested with the students under the patronage of President Mahinda Rajapaksa on Sunday (31)….
